subject: Productivity
title: The Availability Heuristic
description: A quick win: understand The Availability Heuristic.

hook.text: After seeing a plane crash on the news, you feel flying is dangerous. You drove to the airport safely.

buildup.text: The availability heuristic judges probability by how easily examples come to mind.

discovery.text: Vivid, recent, or emotional events feel more common than they actually are.

twist.text: Media amplifies this. Shark attacks get headlines; heart disease doesn't. Fear follows coverage, not data.

climax.text: Checking actual statistics before reacting overrides the heuristic and improves risk assessment.

punchline.text: What's memorable isn't always what's probable.

quiz.question: How does the availability heuristic judge probability?
options: By how easily examples come to mind
